chart.name: access-downloads-series-country-year
chart.query: select sc.name, d.downloads from (select country_code,sum(relative_value) as downloads from stats.download_country_month group by country_code) as d, stats.country sc where d.country_code = sc.code order by d.downloads desc limit 10;

chart.name: access-downloads-series-country-month
chart.query: select sc.name, d.downloads from (select country_code,sum(relative_value) as downloads from stats.download_country_month where year = pyear group by country_code) as d, stats.country sc where d.country_code = sc.code order by d.downloads desc limit 10;

chart.name: access-downloads-series-country-day
chart.query: select sc.name, d.downloads from (select country_code,sum(relative_value) as downloads from stats.v_download where date between to_date('01-pmonth-pyear','DD-MM-YYYY') and (to_date('01-pmonth-pyear','dd-mm-yyyy') + interval '1 month')::date - 1 group by country_code) as d, stats.country sc where d.country_code = sc.code order by d.downloads desc limit 10;

chart.name: access-downloads-series-country-hour
chart.query: select sc.name, d.downloads from (select country_code,sum(relative_value) as downloads from stats.v_download where date = to_date('end','DD-MM-YYYY') group by country_code) as d, stats.country sc where d.country_code = sc.code order by d.downloads desc limit 10;

chart.name: access-views-series-country-year
chart.query: select sc.name, d.views from (select country_code,sum(value) as views from stats.view_country_month group by country_code) as d, stats.country sc where d.country_code = sc.code order by d.views desc limit 10;

chart.name: access-views-series-country-month
chart.query: select sc.name, d.views from (select country_code,sum(value) as views from stats.view_country_month where year = pyear group by country_code) as d, stats.country sc where d.country_code = sc.code order by d.views desc limit 10;

chart.name: access-views-series-country-day
chart.query: select sc.name, d.views from (select country_code,count(*) as views from stats.v_view where date between to_date('01-pmonth-pyear','DD-MM-YYYY') and (to_date('01-pmonth-pyear','dd-mm-yyyy') + interval '1 month')::date - 1 group by country_code) as d, stats.country sc where d.country_code = sc.code order by d.views desc limit 10;

chart.name: access-views-series-country-hour
chart.query: select sc.name, d.views from (select country_code,count(*) as views from stats.v_view where date = to_date('end','DD-MM-YYYY') group by country_code) as d, stats.country sc where d.country_code = sc.code order by d.views desc limit 10;

chart.name: access-downloads-summary-yearmonth
chart.query: select d.month, d.downloads from (select to_date(yearmonth::varchar,'yyyymm') as month, sum(relative_value) as downloads from stats.download_month where yearmonth between ('anoinicio' || 'mesinicio')::integer and ('anofim' || 'mesfim')::integer group by yearmonth) as d order by d.month

chart.name: access-downloads-summary-date
chart.query: select d.date, d.downloads from (select date, sum(relative_value) as downloads from stats.v_download where date between to_date('start','DD-MM-YYYY') and to_date('end','DD-MM-YYYY') group by date) as d order by d.date

chart.name: access-downloads-summary-country-yearmonth
chart.query: select sc.name, d.downloads from (select country_code,sum(relative_value) as downloads from stats.download_country_month where yearmonth between ('anoinicio' || 'mesinicio')::integer and ('anofim' || 'mesfim')::integer group by country_code) as d, stats.country sc where d.country_code = sc.code order by d.downloads desc limit 10;

chart.name: access-downloads-summary-country-date
chart.query: select sc.name, d.downloads from (select country_code,sum(relative_value) as downloads from stats.v_download where date between to_date('start','DD-MM-YYYY') and to_date('end','DD-MM-YYYY') group by country_code) as d, stats.country sc where d.country_code = sc.code order by d.downloads desc limit 10;

chart.name: access-views-summary-yearmonth
chart.query: select c.month, c.views from (select to_date(yearmonth::varchar,'yyyymm') as month, sum(value) as views from stats.view_month where yearmonth between ('anoinicio' || 'mesinicio')::integer and ('anofim' || 'mesfim')::integer group by yearmonth) as c order by c.month

chart.name: access-views-summary-date
chart.query: select c.date, c.views from (select date, count(*) as views from stats.v_view where date between to_date('start','DD-MM-YYYY') and to_date('end','DD-MM-YYYY') group by date) as c order by c.date

chart.name: access-views-summary-country-yearmonth
chart.query: select sc.name, d.views from (select country_code,sum(value) as views from stats.view_country_month where yearmonth between ('anoinicio' || 'mesinicio')::integer and ('anofim' || 'mesfim')::integer group by country_code) as d, stats.country sc where d.country_code = sc.code order by d.views desc limit 10;

chart.name: access-views-summary-country-date
chart.query: select sc.name, d.views from (select country_code,count(*) as views from stats.v_view where date between to_date('start','DD-MM-YYYY') and to_date('end','DD-MM-YYYY') group by country_code) as d, stats.country sc where d.country_code = sc.code order by d.views desc limit 10;

chart.name: access-all-summary-yearmonth
chart.query: select d.mes, sum(d.downloads) as downloads, sum(d.views) as views from (select to_date(yearmonth::varchar,'yyyymm') as mes, sum(relative_value) as downloads, 0 as views from stats.download_month where yearmonth between ('anoinicio' || 'mesinicio')::integer and ('anofim' || 'mesfim')::integer group by yearmonth union all select to_date(yearmonth::varchar,'yyyymm') as mes, 0 as downloads, sum(value) as views from stats.view_month where yearmonth between ('anoinicio' || 'mesinicio')::integer and ('anofim' || 'mesfim')::integer group by yearmonth) as d group by d.mes order by d.mes

chart.name: access-all-summary-date
chart.query: select d.date, sum(d.downloads) as downloads, sum(d.views) as views from (select date, sum(relative_value) as downloads, 0 as views from stats.v_download where date between to_date('start','DD-MM-YYYY') and to_date('end','DD-MM-YYYY') group by date union all select date, 0 as downloads, count(*) as views from stats.v_view where date between to_date('start','DD-MM-YYYY') and to_date('end','DD-MM-YYYY') group by date) as d group by d.date order by d.date

chart.name: access-search-summary-yearmonth
chart.query: select c.month, c.searches from (select to_date(yearmonth::varchar,'yyyymm') as month, sum(value) as searches from stats.search_month where yearmonth between ('anoinicio' || 'mesinicio')::integer and ('anofim' || 'mesfim')::integer group by yearmonth) as c order by c.month

chart.name: access-search-summary-date
chart.query: select c.date, c.searches from (select date, count(*) as searches from stats.v_search where date between to_date('start','DD-MM-YYYY') and to_date('end','DD-MM-YYYY') group by date) as c order by c.date

chart.name: content-docs-type-global
chart.query: select type,count(*) from stats.v_item_type group by type order by 2 desc;

chart.name: content-docs-access-global
chart.query: select access,count(*) from stats.v_item_access group by access order by 2 desc;

chart.name: content-docs-pubyear-global
chart.query: select substr(date_issued,1,4),count(*) from stats.v_itemsbydate group by 1 order by 1 desc;

chart.name: files-format-global
chart.query: select f.format, f.number from (select short_description as format, count(*) as number from stats.v_files group by short_description) as f order by f.number desc;

chart.name: pedidos-summary-date
chart.query: select d.request_date::date, d.pedidos from (select request_date::date, count(*) as pedidos from requestitem where request_date::date between to_date('start','DD-MM-YYYY') and to_date('end','DD-MM-YYYY') group by request_date::date) as d order by d.request_date

chart.name: com-access-downloads-series-country-year
chart.query: select sc.name, d.downloads from (select country_code,sum(relative_value) as downloads from stats.download_country_comm_month where community_id = object-id group by country_code) as d, stats.country sc where d.country_code = sc.code order by d.downloads desc limit 10;

chart.name: com-access-downloads-series-country-month
chart.query: select sc.name, d.downloads from (select country_code,sum(relative_value) as downloads from stats.download_country_comm_month where community_id = object-id and year = pyear group by country_code) as d, stats.country sc where d.country_code = sc.code order by d.downloads desc limit 10;

chart.name: com-access-downloads-series-country-day
chart.query: select sc.name, d.downloads from (select country_code,sum(relative_value) as downloads from stats.v_download_comm where community_id = object-id and date between to_date('01-pmonth-pyear','DD-MM-YYYY') and (to_date('01-pmonth-pyear','dd-mm-yyyy') + interval '1 month')::date - 1 group by country_code) as d, stats.country sc where d.country_code = sc.code order by d.downloads desc limit 10;

chart.name: com-access-downloads-series-country-hour
chart.query: select sc.name, d.downloads from (select country_code,sum(relative_value) as downloads from stats.v_download_comm where community_id = object-id and date = to_date('end','DD-MM-YYYY') group by country_code) as d, stats.country sc where d.country_code = sc.code order by d.downloads desc limit 10;

chart.name: com-access-views-series-country-year
chart.query: select sc.name, d.views from (select country_code,sum(value) as views from stats.view_country_comm_month where community_id = object-id group by country_code) as d, stats.country sc where d.country_code = sc.code order by d.views desc limit 10;

chart.name: com-access-views-series-country-month
chart.query: select sc.name, d.views from (select country_code,sum(value) as views from stats.view_country_comm_month where community_id = object-id and year = pyear group by country_code) as d, stats.country sc where d.country_code = sc.code order by d.views desc limit 10;

chart.name: com-access-views-series-country-day
chart.query: select sc.name, d.views from (select country_code,count(*) as views from stats.v_view_comm where community_id = object-id and date between to_date('01-pmonth-pyear','DD-MM-YYYY') and (to_date('01-pmonth-pyear','dd-mm-yyyy') + interval '1 month')::date - 1 group by country_code) as d, stats.country sc where d.country_code = sc.code order by d.views desc limit 10;

chart.name: com-access-views-series-country-hour
chart.query: select sc.name, d.views from (select country_code,count(*) as views from stats.v_view_comm where community_id = object-id and date = to_date('end','DD-MM-YYYY') group by country_code) as d, stats.country sc where d.country_code = sc.code order by d.views desc limit 10;

chart.name: com-access-downloads-summary-yearmonth
chart.query: select d.month, d.downloads from (select to_date(yearmonth::varchar,'yyyymm') as month, sum(relative_value) as downloads from stats.download_comm_month where community_id = object-id and yearmonth between ('anoinicio' || 'mesinicio')::integer and ('anofim' || 'mesfim')::integer group by yearmonth) as d order by d.month

chart.name: com-access-downloads-summary-date
chart.query: select d.date, d.downloads from (select date, sum(relative_value) as downloads from stats.v_download_comm where community_id = object-id and date between to_date('start','DD-MM-YYYY') and to_date('end','DD-MM-YYYY') group by date) as d order by d.date

chart.name: com-access-downloads-summary-country-yearmonth
chart.query: select sc.name, d.downloads from (select country_code,sum(relative_value) as downloads from stats.download_country_comm_month where community_id = object-id and yearmonth between ('anoinicio' || 'mesinicio')::integer and ('anofim' || 'mesfim')::integer group by country_code) as d, stats.country sc where d.country_code = sc.code order by d.downloads desc limit 10;

chart.name: com-access-downloads-summary-country-date
chart.query: select sc.name, d.downloads from (select country_code,sum(relative_value) as downloads from stats.v_download_comm where community_id = object-id and date between to_date('start','DD-MM-YYYY') and to_date('end','DD-MM-YYYY') group by country_code) as d, stats.country sc where d.country_code = sc.code order by d.downloads desc limit 10;

chart.name: com-access-views-summary-yearmonth
chart.query: select c.month, c.views from (select to_date(yearmonth::varchar,'yyyymm') as month, sum(value) as views from stats.view_comm_month where community_id = object-id and yearmonth between ('anoinicio' || 'mesinicio')::integer and ('anofim' || 'mesfim')::integer group by yearmonth) as c order by c.month

chart.name: com-access-views-summary-date
chart.query: select c.date, c.views from (select date, count(*) as views from stats.v_view_comm where community_id = object-id and date between to_date('start','DD-MM-YYYY') and to_date('end','DD-MM-YYYY') group by date) as c order by c.date

chart.name: com-access-views-summary-country-yearmonth
chart.query: select sc.name, d.views from (select country_code,sum(value) as views from stats.view_country_comm_month where community_id = object-id and yearmonth between ('anoinicio' || 'mesinicio')::integer and ('anofim' || 'mesfim')::integer group by country_code) as d, stats.country sc where d.country_code = sc.code order by d.views desc limit 10;

chart.name: com-access-views-summary-country-date
chart.query: select sc.name, d.views from (select country_code,count(*) as views from stats.v_view_comm where community_id = object-id and date between to_date('start','DD-MM-YYYY') and to_date('end','DD-MM-YYYY') group by country_code) as d, stats.country sc where d.country_code = sc.code order by d.views desc limit 10;

chart.name: com-access-all-summary-yearmonth
chart.query: select d.mes, sum(d.downloads) as downloads, sum(d.views) as views from (select to_date(yearmonth::varchar,'yyyymm') as mes, sum(relative_value) as downloads, 0 as views from stats.download_comm_month where community_id = object-id and yearmonth between ('anoinicio' || 'mesinicio')::integer and ('anofim' || 'mesfim')::integer group by yearmonth union all select to_date(yearmonth::varchar,'yyyymm') as mes, 0 as downloads, sum(value) as views from stats.view_comm_month where community_id = object-id and yearmonth between ('anoinicio' || 'mesinicio')::integer and ('anofim' || 'mesfim')::integer group by yearmonth) as d group by d.mes order by d.mes

chart.name: com-access-all-summary-date
chart.query: select d.date, sum(d.downloads) as downloads, sum(d.views) as views from (select date, sum(relative_value) as downloads, 0 as views from stats.v_download_comm where community_id = object-id and date between to_date('start','DD-MM-YYYY') and to_date('end','DD-MM-YYYY') group by date union all select date, 0 as downloads, count(*) as views from stats.v_view_comm where community_id = object-id and date between to_date('start','DD-MM-YYYY') and to_date('end','DD-MM-YYYY') group by date) as d group by d.date order by d.date

chart.name: com-access-search-summary-yearmonth
chart.query: select to_date(c.month,'yyyy-mm'), c.searches from (select substr(date::varchar,1,7) as month, count(*) as searches from stats.v_search where scope='community' and scope_id = 'object-id' and date between to_date('01-mesinicio-anoinicio','DD-MM-YYYY') and (to_date('01-mesfim-anofim','dd-mm-yyyy') + interval '1 month')::date - 1 group by month) as c order by c.month

chart.name: com-access-search-summary-date
chart.query: select c.date, c.searches from (select date, count(*) as searches from stats.v_search where scope='community' and scope_id = 'object-id' and date between to_date('start','DD-MM-YYYY') and to_date('end','DD-MM-YYYY') group by date) as c order by c.date

chart.name: com-content-docs-type-global
chart.query: select type,count(*) from stats.v_item_type_comm where community_id = object-id group by type order by 2 desc;

chart.name: com-content-docs-access-global
chart.query: select access,count(*) from stats.v_item_access_comm where community_id = object-id group by access order by 2 desc;

chart.name: com-content-docs-pubyear-global
chart.query: select substr(i.date_issued,1,4),count(*) from stats.v_itemsbydate i, communities2item ci where i.item_id = ci.item_id and ci.community_id = 'object-id' group by 1 order by 1 desc;

chart.name: com-files-format-global
chart.query: select f.format, f.number from (select short_description as format, count(*) as number from stats.v_files_comm where community_id = object-id group by short_description) as f order by f.number desc;

chart.name: col-access-downloads-series-country-year
chart.query: select sc.name, d.downloads from (select country_code,sum(relative_value) as downloads from stats.download_country_coll_month where collection_id = object-id group by country_code) as d, stats.country sc where d.country_code = sc.code order by d.downloads desc limit 10;

chart.name: col-access-views-series-country-year
chart.query: select sc.name, d.views from (select country_code,sum(value) as views from stats.view_country_coll_month where collection_id = object-id group by country_code) as d, stats.country sc where d.country_code = sc.code order by d.views desc limit 10;

chart.name: col-access-views-series-country-month
chart.query: select sc.name, d.views from (select country_code,sum(value) as views from stats.view_country_coll_month where collection_id = object-id and year = pyear group by country_code) as d, stats.country sc where d.country_code = sc.code order by d.views desc limit 10;

chart.name: col-access-views-series-country-day
chart.query: select sc.name, d.views from (select country_code,count(*) as views from stats.v_view_coll where collection_id = object-id and date between to_date('01-pmonth-pyear','DD-MM-YYYY') and (to_date('01-pmonth-pyear','dd-mm-yyyy') + interval '1 month')::date - 1 group by country_code) as d, stats.country sc where d.country_code = sc.code order by d.views desc limit 10;

chart.name: col-access-views-series-country-hour
chart.query: select sc.name, d.views from (select country_code,count(*) as views from stats.v_view_coll where collection_id = object-id and date = to_date('end','DD-MM-YYYY') group by country_code) as d, stats.country sc where d.country_code = sc.code order by d.views desc limit 10;

chart.name: col-access-downloads-summary-yearmonth
chart.query: select d.month, d.downloads from (select to_date(yearmonth::varchar,'yyyymm') as month, sum(relative_value) as downloads from stats.download_coll_month where collection_id = object-id and yearmonth between ('anoinicio' || 'mesinicio')::integer and ('anofim' || 'mesfim')::integer group by yearmonth) as d order by d.month

chart.name: col-access-downloads-summary-date
chart.query: select d.date, d.downloads from (select date, sum(relative_value) as downloads from stats.v_download_coll where collection_id = object-id and date between to_date('start','DD-MM-YYYY') and to_date('end','DD-MM-YYYY') group by date) as d order by d.date

chart.query: select sc.name, d.downloads from (select country_code,sum(relative_value) as downloads from stats.download_country_coll_month where collection_id = object-id and yearmonth between ('anoinicio' || 'mesinicio')::integer and ('anofim' || 'mesfim')::integer group by country_code) as d, stats.country sc where d.country_code = sc.code order by d.downloads desc limit 10;

chart.name: col-access-downloads-summary-country-date
chart.query: select sc.name, d.downloads from (select country_code,sum(relative_value) as downloads from stats.v_download_coll where collection_id = object-id and date between to_date('start','DD-MM-YYYY') and to_date('end','DD-MM-YYYY') group by country_code) as d, stats.country sc where d.country_code = sc.code order by d.downloads desc limit 10;

chart.name: col-access-views-summary-yearmonth
chart.query: select c.month, c.views from (select to_date(yearmonth::varchar,'yyyymm') as month, sum(value) as views from stats.view_coll_month where collection_id = object-id and yearmonth between ('anoinicio' || 'mesinicio')::integer and ('anofim' || 'mesfim')::integer group by yearmonth) as c order by c.month

chart.query: select c.date, c.views from (select date, count(*) as views from stats.v_view_coll where collection_id = object-id and date between to_date('start','DD-MM-YYYY') and to_date('end','DD-MM-YYYY') group by date) as c order by c.date

chart.name: col-access-views-summary-country-yearmonth
chart.query: select sc.name, d.views from (select country_code,sum(value) as views from stats.view_country_coll_month where collection_id = object-id and yearmonth between ('anoinicio' || 'mesinicio')::integer and ('anofim' || 'mesfim')::integer group by country_code) as d, stats.country sc where d.country_code = sc.code order by d.views desc limit 10;

chart.name: col-access-views-summary-country-date
chart.query: select sc.name, d.views from (select country_code,count(*) as views from stats.v_view_coll where collection_id = object-id and date between to_date('start','DD-MM-YYYY') and to_date('end','DD-MM-YYYY') group by country_code) as d, stats.country sc where d.country_code = sc.code order by d.views desc limit 10;

chart.name: col-access-all-summary-yearmonth
chart.query: select d.mes, sum(d.downloads) as downloads, sum(d.views) as views from (select to_date(yearmonth::varchar,'yyyymm') as mes, sum(relative_value) as downloads, 0 as views from stats.download_coll_month where collection_id = object-id and yearmonth between ('anoinicio' || 'mesinicio')::integer and ('anofim' || 'mesfim')::integer group by yearmonth union all select to_date(yearmonth::varchar,'yyyymm') as mes, 0 as downloads, sum(value) as views from stats.view_coll_month where collection_id = object-id and yearmonth between ('anoinicio' || 'mesinicio')::integer and ('anofim' || 'mesfim')::integer group by yearmonth) as d group by d.mes order by d.mes

chart.name: col-access-all-summary-date
chart.query: select d.date, sum(d.downloads) as downloads, sum(d.views) as views from (select date, sum(relative_value) as downloads, 0 as views from stats.v_download_coll where collection_id = object-id and date between to_date('start','DD-MM-YYYY') and to_date('end','DD-MM-YYYY') group by date union all select date, 0 as downloads, count(*) as views from stats.v_view_coll where collection_id = object-id and date between to_date('start','DD-MM-YYYY') and to_date('end','DD-MM-YYYY') group by date) as d group by d.date order by d.date

chart.name: col-access-search-summary-yearmonth
chart.query: select to_date(c.month,'yyyy-mm'), c.searches from (select substr(date::varchar,1,7) as month, count(*) as searches from stats.v_search where scope='collection' and scope_id = 'object-id' and date between to_date('01-mesinicio-anoinicio','DD-MM-YYYY') and (to_date('01-mesfim-anofim','dd-mm-yyyy') + interval '1 month')::date - 1 group by month) as c order by c.month

chart.name: col-access-search-summary-date
chart.query: select c.date, c.searches from (select date, count(*) as searches from stats.v_search where scope='collection' and scope_id = 'object-id' and date between to_date('start','DD-MM-YYYY') and to_date('end','DD-MM-YYYY') group by date) as c order by c.date

chart.name: col-content-docs-type-global
chart.query: select type,count(*) from stats.v_item_type_coll where collection_id = object-id group by type order by 2 desc;

chart.name: col-content-docs-access-global
chart.query: select access,count(*) from stats.v_item_access_coll where collection_id = object-id group by access order by 2 desc;

chart.name: col-content-docs-pubyear-global
chart.query: select substr(i.date_issued,1,4),count(*) from stats.v_itemsbydate i, collection2item ci where i.item_id = ci.item_id and ci.collection_id = 'object-id' group by 1 order by 1 desc;

chart.name: col-files-format-global
chart.query: select f.format, f.number from (select short_description as format, count(*) as number from stats.v_files_coll where collection_id = object-id group by short_description) as f order by f.number desc;

chart.name: it-access-downloads-series-country-year
chart.query: select sc.name, d.downloads from (select country_code,sum(relative_value::real) as downloads from stats.v_download where handle='object-id' group by country_code) as d, stats.country sc where d.country_code = sc.code order by d.downloads desc limit 10;

chart.name: it-access-downloads-series-country-month
chart.query: select sc.name, d.downloads from (select country_code,sum(relative_value::real) as downloads from stats.v_download where handle='object-id' and substr(date::character varying,1,4)='pyear' group by country_code) as d, stats.country sc where d.country_code = sc.code order by d.downloads desc limit 10;

chart.name: it-access-downloads-series-country-day
chart.query: select sc.name, d.downloads from (select country_code,sum(relative_value::real) as downloads from stats.v_download where handle='object-id' and date between to_date('01-pmonth-pyear','DD-MM-YYYY') and (to_date('01-pmonth-pyear','dd-mm-yyyy') + interval '1 month')::date - 1 group by country_code) as d, stats.country sc where d.country_code = sc.code order by d.downloads desc limit 10;

chart.name: it-access-downloads-series-country-hour
chart.query: select sc.name, d.downloads from (select country_code,sum(relative_value::real) as downloads from stats.v_download where handle='object-id' and date = to_date('end','DD-MM-YYYY') group by country_code) as d, stats.country sc where d.country_code = sc.code order by d.downloads desc limit 10;

chart.name: it-access-views-series-country-year
chart.query: select sc.name, d.views from (select country_code,count(*) as views from stats.v_view where handle='object-id' group by country_code) as d, stats.country sc where d.country_code = sc.code order by d.views desc limit 10;

chart.name: it-access-views-series-country-month
chart.query: select sc.name, d.views from (select country_code,count(*) as views from stats.v_view where handle='object-id' and substr(date::character varying,1,4)='pyear' group by country_code) as d, stats.country sc where d.country_code = sc.code order by d.views desc limit 10;

chart.name: it-access-views-series-country-day
chart.query: select sc.name, d.views from (select country_code,count(*) as views from stats.v_view where handle='object-id' and date between to_date('01-pmonth-pyear','DD-MM-YYYY') and (to_date('01-pmonth-pyear','dd-mm-yyyy') + interval '1 month')::date - 1 group by country_code) as d, stats.country sc where d.country_code = sc.code order by d.views desc limit 10;

chart.name: it-access-views-series-country-hour
chart.query: select sc.name, d.views from (select country_code,count(*) as views from stats.v_view where handle='object-id' and date = to_date('end','DD-MM-YYYY') group by country_code) as d, stats.country sc where d.country_code = sc.code order by d.views desc limit 10;

chart.name: it-access-downloads-summary-yearmonth
chart.query: select d.month, d.downloads from (select to_date(yearmonth::varchar,'yyyymm') as month, sum(relative_value) as downloads from stats.download_item_month, handle where item_id = resource_id and resource_type_id=2 and handle='object-id' and yearmonth between ('anoinicio' || 'mesinicio')::integer and ('anofim' || 'mesfim')::integer group by yearmonth) as d order by d.month

chart.name: it-access-downloads-summary-date
chart.query: select d.date, d.downloads from (select date, sum(relative_value::real) as downloads from stats.v_download where handle='object-id' and date between to_date('start','DD-MM-YYYY') and to_date('end','DD-MM-YYYY') group by date) as d order by d.date

chart.name: it-access-downloads-summary-country-yearmonth
chart.query: select sc.name, d.downloads from (select country_code,sum(relative_value::real) as downloads from stats.v_download where handle='object-id' and date between to_date('01-mesinicio-anoinicio','DD-MM-YYYY') and (to_date('01-mesfim-anofim','dd-mm-yyyy') + interval '1 month')::date - 1 group by country_code) as d, stats.country sc where d.country_code = sc.code order by d.downloads desc limit 10;

chart.name: it-access-downloads-summary-country-date
chart.query: select sc.name, d.downloads from (select country_code,(sum(relative_value::real)) as downloads from stats.v_download where handle='object-id' and date between to_date('start','DD-MM-YYYY') and to_date('end','DD-MM-YYYY') group by country_code) as d, stats.country sc where d.country_code = sc.code order by d.downloads desc limit 10;

chart.name: it-access-views-summary-yearmonth
chart.query: select d.month, d.views from (select to_date(yearmonth::varchar,'yyyymm') as month, sum(value) as views from stats.view_item_month, handle where item_id = resource_id and resource_type_id=2 and handle.handle='object-id' and yearmonth between ('anoinicio' || 'mesinicio')::integer and ('anofim' || 'mesfim')::integer group by yearmonth) as d order by d.month

chart.name: it-access-views-summary-date
chart.query: select d.date, d.views from (select date, count(*) as views from stats.v_view where handle='object-id' and date between to_date('start','DD-MM-YYYY') and to_date('end','DD-MM-YYYY') group by date) as d order by d.date

chart.name: it-access-views-summary-country-yearmonth
chart.query: select sc.name, d.views from (select country_code,count(*) as views from stats.v_view where handle='object-id' and date between to_date('01-mesinicio-anoinicio','DD-MM-YYYY') and (to_date('01-mesfim-anofim','dd-mm-yyyy') + interval '1 month')::date - 1 group by country_code) as d, stats.country sc where d.country_code = sc.code order by d.views desc limit 10;

chart.name: it-access-views-summary-country-date
chart.query: select sc.name, d.views from (select country_code,count(*) as views from stats.v_view where handle='object-id' and date between to_date('start','DD-MM-YYYY') and to_date('end','DD-MM-YYYY') group by country_code) as d, stats.country sc where d.country_code = sc.code order by d.views desc limit 10;

chart.name: it-access-all-summary-yearmonth
chart.query: select d.mes, sum(d.downloads) as downloads, sum(d.views) as views from (select to_date(yearmonth::varchar,'yyyymm') as mes, sum(relative_value) as downloads, 0 as views from stats.download_item_month, handle where item_id = resource_id and resource_type_id=2 and handle.handle='object-id' and yearmonth between ('anoinicio' || 'mesinicio')::integer and ('anofim' || 'mesfim')::integer group by yearmonth union all select to_date(yearmonth::varchar,'yyyymm') as mes, 0 as downloads, sum(value) as views from stats.view_item_month, handle where item_id = resource_id and resource_type_id=2 and handle.handle='object-id' and yearmonth between ('anoinicio' || 'mesinicio')::integer and ('anofim' || 'mesfim')::integer group by yearmonth) as d group by d.mes order by d.mes

chart.name: it-access-all-summary-date
chart.query: select d.date, sum(d.downloads) as downloads, sum(d.views) as views from (select date, sum(relative_value) as downloads, 0 as views from stats.v_download where handle='object-id' and date between to_date('start','DD-MM-YYYY') and to_date('end','DD-MM-YYYY') group by date union all select date, 0 as downloads, count(*) as views from stats.v_view where handle='object-id' and date between to_date('start','DD-MM-YYYY') and to_date('end','DD-MM-YYYY') group by date) as d group by d.date order by d.date
